title: [Large-scale] Gamification-Enhanced Intensive Web Design and Programming Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic web concepts understanding, management experience, and quantitative reasoning abilities
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment course for advanced professionals in managerial/leadership roles, conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Implement HTML/CSS-based responsive web layouts through gamification missions within three days
Form teams by day five and complete/evaluate web prototypes using collaboration tools accessible only via smartphones
Enhance web development problem-solving skills through competition and collaboration with peers using gamification elements (experience points, badges, leaderboards)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
